resources.string: I am currently a graduate computer science student at Pace University and seeking opportunities to use the state-of-the-art technology to solve real-world problems. My journey with information technology started during my junior year in high school where I took course in computer technology to fulfill graduation requirements. From there I realized I wanted to pursue IT and software engineering as a career. At Farmingdale State College I took programming courses that covered aspects such as Database Systems, Web Development, Systems Analysis, UNIX Operating Systems, Algorithms and Data Structures. After my time at Farmingdale, I decided to continue my studies at the Seidenberg School of Computer Science and Information Systems. There I took even more classes and I am currently partaking in a Capstone project in anticipation of graduating this coming May.
Three main hobbies of mine are theatre, gaming and cosplay.
